author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added a batch test that will run all tests for the Logic Taglibs.  Added a cleanup for Tomcat 3 and 4 so the "test.all" can be run twice in a row.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added insertValidator method to make it easier to subclass the ValidatorForm.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: This class subclasses ValidatorForm and uses the action element's 'path' attribute in the struts-config.xml file.
This will allow someone to have their validation rules tied to an action (if there is one for each for) instead of using "page=1".
